hero.title: PVC Conduit Bends & Fittings. Factory Direct.
hero.subtitle: From the manufacturer that designs and builds its own bending machines. Full vertical integration from equipment R&D to finished product.

chain.title: Full-Chain Control. All In-House.
chain.subtitle: We design and build our own bending machines. That upstream control is how we maintain consistent quality from raw material to finished conduit.

products.title: Product Lines
products.subtitle: Four categories covering 16mm to 168mm diameter. Custom OD, wall thickness, and length available.

item4.title: Custom & OEM Projects
item4.spec1: Custom angles, OD, and wall thickness

resources.title: Product Resources
resources.subtitle: Technical documentation, CAD files, and certification details for engineering and procurement teams.

item1.title: Product Catalog
item1.desc: Complete product listings with dimensions, materials, and ordering codes.

item2.title: Technical Specifications
item2.desc: Detailed datasheets with tolerances, material grades, and test reports.

item3.title: CAD Downloads
item3.desc: 2D and 3D drawings in DWG, STEP, and IGES formats for your engineering team.

item4.title: Certifications
item4.desc: ISO 9001, test reports, and compliance documentation for your procurement files.

sample.title: Test Before You Commit.
sample.description: Verify the quality yourself. Free samples ship within 3 business days — you only pay freight.

scenarios.title: Where Our Conduits Work
scenarios.subtitle: Field-proven in construction, infrastructure, and industrial installations across 20+ countries.

item1.title: Underground Pre-Burial
item1.desc: Pre-bent conduits for direct burial. Consistent bend radius eliminates field cracking under soil pressure.
item1.quote: "The bends arrived ready to install. Saved us 2 days on site." — Project Manager, UAE

item2.title: Commercial & Data Center
item2.desc: Complete conduit solutions for high-density electrical infrastructure across multi-story projects.
item2.quote: "Consistent quality across 3 data center builds." — Project Director, UAE

item3.title: Municipal Infrastructure
item3.desc: Up to 168mm diameter for underground cable protection in power distribution and telecom networks.
item3.quote: "Big pipes, tight tolerances. They delivered." — City Engineer, Southeast Asia

quality.title: Our Commitments
quality.subtitle: Written guarantees backed by process control and documentation.

commitment1.title: 48-Hour Drawings
commitment1.desc: Technical drawings delivered within 2 business days of spec confirmation.

commitment2.title: Batch Traceability
commitment2.desc: Every shipment documented with material source and QC test records.

commitment3.title: Export-Ready Packaging
commitment3.desc: Palletized, labeled, and optimized for container loading.

commitment4.title: Dedicated Contact
commitment4.desc: Single point of contact from quotation through delivery and after-sales.

commitment5.title: Flexible MOQ
commitment5.desc: Low minimums for first orders. Scale volumes as your projects grow.

finalCta.title: Ready to Get Started?
finalCta.description: Get a quote, request samples, or book a technical consultation. We respond within 24 hours.

instructions.title: How to Use This Demo
instructions.step1: Press Ctrl+Shift+X to toggle React Scan on/off
instructions.step2: Click the buttons below to trigger different types of renders
instructions.step3: Watch for red highlights (unnecessary renders) and green highlights (optimized renders)
instructions.step4: Use the React Scan toolbar in the bottom-right corner for detailed analysis

about.pageDescription: Discover Tianze Pipe Industry - pipe bending experts with integrated equipment, process, and fittings solutions. ISO 9001:2015 certified manufacturer.

hero.title: Pipe Bending Experts
hero.subtitle: Equipment + Process + Fittings Integrated
hero.description: Lianyungang Tianze Pipe Industry Co., Ltd. is a specialized manufacturer of PVC electrical conduits and PETG pneumatic tubes. With proprietary bending equipment and in-house mold development, we deliver complete solutions from machinery to finished fittings.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To be the world's most trusted pipe bending partner by providing integrated solutions that combine advanced machinery, precision processes, and high-quality fittings. We empower our clients with technology, not just products.

quality.title: Precision Engineering
quality.description: Every bend is engineered for perfection. Our CNC-controlled equipment delivers consistent quality with tolerances measured in fractions of a millimeter.

innovation.title: In-House R&D
innovation.description: From bending machines to custom molds, we develop our own technology. This vertical integration means faster innovation and better solutions.

service.title: Technical Support
service.description: We don't just sell products - we transfer knowledge. Complete technical training, installation support, and lifetime maintenance guidance included.

integrity.title: Certified Quality
integrity.description: ISO 9001:2015 certified with UL, ASTM, and AS/NZS compliance. Every batch is traceable, every product is guaranteed.

cta.title: Partner With Pipe Bending Experts
cta.description: Whether you need bending machines, custom molds, or finished fittings, our team is ready to deliver. Get a free consultation and quote today.

products.pageDescription: Explore our comprehensive range of high-quality products for your business needs.
products.emptyState: No products available. Please check back later.

inquiry.description: Interested in this product? Send us an inquiry for pricing and availability.
